name: Moo Times of Betsy
description:
Originally started as an old webcomic series around 2011-2013 on my website, Moo Times of Betsy follows the adventures of a plush cow animal named Betsy as she contemplates about life in an udderly fashion. 

The visual novel series will be released as bite-sized episodes where the player gets to choose two - three different endings. Future episodes will be based on real life experiences but from the perspective of a plush animal cow as she watches, interacts and observes her owners on the highs and lows of their lives. 

The first episode will be about the adoption of Betsy the cow. This was made during NaNoReno 2019. My hope is that it'll bring joy and laughter to those who play the game as this is my first time creating via Ren'Py. 

If you happen to spot any errors, please don't hesitate to let me know!

You can follow me on my social media channels and my website below:
